verses.verse: The message <S%H1697><s%> that Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Baruch <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Neriah, <S%H5374><s%> when he wrote <S%H3789><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%> at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah, <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to you, <S%H1263><s%> Baruch:

You said, <S%H559><s%> Woe <S%H188><s%> is me now! <S%H3068><s%> for Yahweh has added <S%H3254><s%> sorrow <S%H3015><s%> to my pain; <S%H4341><s%> I am weary <S%H3021><s%> with my groaning, <S%H585><s%> and I find <S%H4672><s%> no rest. <S%H4496><s%>

You shall tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> Thus says Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H1129><s%> that which I have built will I break down, <S%H2040><s%> and that which I have planted <S%H5193><s%> I will pluck up; <S%H5428><s%> and this in the whole land. <S%H776><s%>

Do you seek <S%H1245><s%> great things <S%H1419><s%> for yourself? <S%H1245><s%> Don't seek them; <S%H935><s%> for, behold, I will bring evil <S%H7451><s%> on all flesh, <S%H1320><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> but your life <S%H5315><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> to you for a prey <S%H7998><s%> in all places <S%H4725><s%> where you go. <S%H3212><s%>
